title: The Transition tapes
brief_description: These tapes are intended to aid the Transition Education evaluation process by raising relevant questions and issues. They enable re-assessment of attitudes to learning and resources, employment and unemployment from five viewpoints : student, teacher, community, employer and school administrator. No other credits available.
